shots.description: Night rain on the city. A single violinist plays under a street lamp while cars pass in the distance.
Closer shot of the violinist’s face, eyes closed, raindrops on the instrument, soft neon reflections in the puddles.
The next morning, the violinist rides a tram through the city, watching the world pass by the window in slow motion.
Inside a quiet cafe, the violinist sits by the window, notebook open, sketching music ideas on paper.
Evening rooftop performance with a small crowd gathered, string lights overhead, city skyline in the background.
Montage of hands on strings, city lights blurring in bokeh, silhouettes walking in the rain, and the violinist smiling at the camera.
Final wide shot of the city at blue hour, the violinist standing on a bridge, music echoing as cars stream by in light trails.
